statuses.name: Tom Brady Bashes Buffalo Hotels Days Before Super Bowl | wgrz.com

data.message: he's probably right... they probably suck. How many of us have actually stayed in a hotel in buffalo. his parents probably stay at the same hotel the team stays at and they are probably the marriott across from the airport or something. If he is bashing our night life or cultural achievements or something of substance like one Willis McGahee, sure get pissed, but come on... hotels?  Lets wish devastation and harm on a great athlete for not loving our hotels... I'm with Chris Coppo.
I hate Tom Brady just as much as the next Buffalonian.... But this is quite a large overreaction lol

statuses.caption: www.wgrz.com
statuses.message:
honestly. what a douche. really tom brady? really? i hope one of the giants tackles you so hard that they snap your neck. and you're forced to drink your food through a straw. do you not get that nobody likes you? you are such a DOUCHE!

http://www.wgrz.com/news/article/153470/1/Tom-Brady-Bashes-Buffalo-Hotels-Days-Before-Super-Bowl
statuses.description: BUFFALO, N.Y. - As if Western New Yorkers and Bills fans needed another reason to despise New England Patriots quarterback Tom Brady.
